name: Mineblast!!
description:
Explore a dangerous mine and blast your way out using TNTs.

Mineblast!! is a platformer game with fully destructible environments. Blast walls to open your way, blast soil and crates to find precious gems, blast wooden platforms to use them as a bridge, there is no limit to your creativity.

Features:
• Fully destructible environments and physics.
• Quality pixel art graphics and chiptune music.
• Lots of hidden secrets and levels.
• Super Cat Tales characters.
• Hours and hours of fun!
